title: Game Scoop Presents: The 100 Questions Challenge (2020 Ed.)
description: It's that time of year again -- time for a FEAST of 20 questions challenges. Everyone knows that each episode of Game Scoop!, IGN's weekly video game podcast, ends with a round of Video Game 20 Questions. And once a year, around a certain gluttonous holiday, we send the Omega Cops through a gauntlet of 100 Questions to see how many games they can guess. Play along at home!
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
